data.name: Valkyrie: Journey To Midgard
data.detailed_description:
Recommended for You

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782130/12_Red_Riding_Hood/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043260/Gladiator_Guild_Manager/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1069050/Little_Dungeon_Stories/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491510/Recon_Control/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1253710/Garbage/


About the Game

About This Game

"Defeats fierce monsters, loots treasures while trying to survive in the dark dungeon". In this hardcore RPG, you will play the role of a Valkyrie. She has traveled to Midgard to retrieve Dragon Orb - one of 4 greatest divine treasures. It will be a difficult adventure with countless monsters block her way and they are only getting stronger and stronger. To be able to survive, you will have to learn to adapt to the situation, customize your fighting style accordingly .

Key Features

- Hardcore RPG
- Highly customizable fighting style

You may also like these games:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255320/Strip_Card_Duel/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670890/Lamias_Plan/

data.short_description: Dragon Orb has been stolen from Asgard. Valkyrie has been sent down to Midgard to retrieve the lost treasure. The goddess must not only overcome fierce monsters, but also to face a dark conspiracy that will affect all of nine realms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or larger display
